title: Barricader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select two slots in between players on the player list. You will set up two barriers on those spots. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Barriers act as players (3179B), but block players from visiting other players on the other side of it.
- Example: The player list is #1, #2, Barrier, #3, #4, #5, Barrier, #6. #1, #2, and #3 can only visit each other, as there's two barriers in the way.

desc:
Post 3179
*Not being able to visit your enemy is the best defense. Keep that in mi- **gets shot***
